milestones.description: John Reid and Jeff Crowe's 97-run partnership is NZ's highest for the 4th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 93 between Jeremy Coney and Martin Crowe
de Silva has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (25) for SL, going past Duleep Mendis
